HOME.TITLE: Home
HOME.INTRO_SUBTITLE: Where music creates connection, with purpose and attention.

TEXT.CONCEPT:
Picollect is a cultural movement that connects music and celebration to create connection with clear purpose.

Born in a city that moves fast, we create conscious spaces where mental health is openly accepted as a human reality, not as a trend or campaign.

Through music-based experiences, we promote presence, community and shared energy, making celebration something meaningful.

Picollect redefines how we celebrate.
With purpose. With people. With attention.
TEXT.MISSION:
Our mission is to create connection through meaningful celebration.

We develop music-based experiences that promote presence, openness and honest connection.

Mental health is at the core of everything we do, through visibility, concrete actions and long-term commitment.
TEXT.VISION:
We envision a culture where celebration creates impact.

Where events are not defined by their size, but by what they trigger.

Where music creates consciousness, community creates cohesion, and purpose becomes part of nightlife.

Our vision is to develop Picollect as a platform that connects artists, communities and mental health, in Luxembourg and beyond.
TEXT.MANIFIESTO:
We believe that celebration is a responsibility.
We believe that music is a universal language.

We believe that mental health deserves care, access and visibility, and that joy and consciousness can coexist.

Picollect is not just something you participate in.
It's something you stand for.

TEXT.CELEBRATE: We celebrate every achievement, large or small, as a community.
TEXT.AWARENESS: We promote awareness and learning for continuous growth.
TEXT.COMMUNITY: Our community is open, inclusive, and supportive.
TEXT.IMPACT: We strive to make a positive impact in everything we do.

POINT_1.TITLE: Mental Health
POINT_1.DESCRIPTION: Emotional well-being is at the center of celebration. We create safe and open spaces where mental health is recognized, respected and supported as a shared responsibility.

POINT_2.TITLE: Celebrate
POINT_2.DESCRIPTION: Music, movement and shared energy, designed to be vibrant, present and deeply human.

POINT_3.TITLE: Community
POINT_3.DESCRIPTION: Built with people, not for masses. Everyone plays a role, and cohesion comes before size.

POINT_4.TITLE: Impact
POINT_4.DESCRIPTION:
We turn celebration into action. At least 10% of our net profits support local NGOs in the mental health sector.

Through the 3.14 Program, each event provides free access to therapy. Three people receive one year of support, and fourteen people receive one month of therapy.

In total, nearly 200 hours of care are offered.

COMINGSOON.DESCRIPTION: This section will be available soon.

CONTACT.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Thank you for subscribing! We'll keep you updated.
